name: insubordinate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person) not willing to obey orders from people in authority, or (of actions and speech, etc.) showing that you are not willing to obey orders: an insubordinate child

unruly
See more results »
Add to word list
Add to word list
refusing to obey orders from someone in authority, and not showing respect for them: We shall take action against city employees who are insubordinate, or who are discourteous to the public.
